name: Oscar Ribeiro de Almeida Niemeyer Soares Filho
significant_buildings: Palácio da Alvorada - Cathedral of Brasília-National Congress of Brazil-Edifício Copan-Ibirapuera Park-United Nations headquarters- Niterói Contemporary Art Museum
significant_projects: Museum of Modern Art of Caracas
awards: 1963 Lenin Peace Prize-1975 Order of Prince Henry -1988 Pritzker Prize-1989 Prince of Asturias Award- 1990 Order of St. Gregory the Great - 1994 Order of Saint James of the Sword - 1998 RIBA Royal Gold Medal-Legion of Honour (France)-Order of Friendship (Russia)-Ordem do Mérito Cultural (Brazil)
